title: New HUD either needs improvement or deletion...
body:
How bout Rito puts a poll out to allow us to give opinions that actually count on the new HUD. Its rather impractical and I don't see what was wrong with the old one?
Problems I see with it:
- Takes up wayyy too much space on the screen. (Yes I know you can downscale it but then it makes it near impossible to see the text.)
- Hard to adjust to the new placement of important features, such as scores, damage etc
- Hard to tell at  glance cs, experience
- And why on earth have a picture of the champion that your playings head that takes up like a quarter of the screen...
Just not a fan and I know i'm not the only one.

Agreed with all of your points. Simplicity of the old HUD was beautiful. Simplicity = Gameplay. Leave the fancy designs to skins.
Or maybe we could have the option to switch between new and old based on preference

After playing a few games on the new hud, i find that the design and colouring amplifies the darker side of the overall map and aplies a much darker mood to the overall feel of the map and generally feels depressing. Where as the older hud amplified the more rocky and magical side of sum rift and gave the map a more adventurous feel rather than depressing.
I was originally for the hud but now.......
